name: Lobo the Punisher
description:
Our team is happy to present our game to you! Have fun and play in full screen mode с:

The smug Lobo the Punisher thinks making games is very easy and goes to the 9th Klagenfurt Game Jam to win. But he does not suspect that he will be punished for such arrogance!

All assets (art / code / sounds / music / effects) were created during the 9th Klagenfurt Game Jam

Control: WASD - Movement, Shift - Sprint, Space- Jump

Play in Fullscreen^^
